description: Updates the properties associated with the proficiencies of a user.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: The identifier of the user account.

parameters.name: UserProficiencies
parameters.description: The proficiencies to be updated for the user. Proficiencies must first be associated to the user. You can do this using AssociateUserProficiencies API. (dict) --- Information about proficiency of a user. The name of user's proficiency. You must use name of predefined attribute present in the Amazon Connect instance. The value of user's proficiency. You must use value of predefined attribute present in the Amazon Connect instance. The level of the proficiency. The valid values are 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5.

nested_params.name: AttributeName
nested_params.description: The name of user's proficiency. You must use name of predefined attribute present in the Amazon Connect instance.

nested_params.name: AttributeValue
nested_params.description: The value of user's proficiency. You must use value of predefined attribute present in the Amazon Connect instance.

nested_params.name: Level
nested_params.description: The level of the proficiency. The valid values are 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5.
